name: I Am Cheese
description:
You are a sentient cheese come to life at the bottom of a rat-infested sewer. Solve puzzles to find your way out with the "help" of a lazy rat who you can consult when stuck for mixed results....

Controls:

W - Forward
A - Left
S - Back
D - Right
Spacebar - jump
X - interact
P - quit

Features: 
Terrible Physics
Flying Cheese
Skience
A Rat in the Wall

This game was made for the college game jam 2021 using assets made during the game jam (in blender), a variety of materials available in unreal, the Horror and Thriller Ambient Music pack by Andrew Sitkov, and some sound effects from ZapSplat.com (mouse noises).
